org.apache.flink.runtime.blob

类 BlobCacheService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.blob.BlobCacheService
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, BlobService

    public class BlobCacheService
extends java.lang.Object
implements BlobService
    The BLOB cache provides access to BLOB services for permanent and transient BLOBs.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      private PermanentBlobCache permanentBlobCache
      Caching store for permanent BLOBs.
      private TransientBlobCache transientBlobCache
      Store for transient BLOB files.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      BlobCacheService(java.net.InetSocketAddress serverAddress, Configuration blobClientConfig, BlobView blobView)
      Instantiates a new BLOB cache.
      BlobCacheService(PermanentBlobCache permanentBlobCache, TransientBlobCache transientBlobCache)
      Instantiates a new BLOB cache.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void close() 
      PermanentBlobCache getPermanentBlobService()
      Returns a BLOB service for accessing permanent BLOBs.
      int getPort()
      Returns the port of the BLOB server that this BLOB service is working with.
      TransientBlobCache getTransientBlobService()
      Returns a BLOB service for accessing transient BLOBs.

      • permanentBlobCache

        private final PermanentBlobCache permanentBlobCache
        Caching store for permanent BLOBs.

      • transientBlobCache

        private final TransientBlobCache transientBlobCache
        Store for transient BLOB files.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • BlobCacheService

        public BlobCacheService(java.net.InetSocketAddress serverAddress,
                        Configuration blobClientConfig,
                        BlobView blobView)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Instantiates a new BLOB cache.
        参数:
        serverAddress - address of the BlobServer to use for fetching files from
        blobClientConfig - global configuration
        blobView - (distributed) blob store file system to retrieve files from first
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - thrown if the (local or distributed) file storage cannot be created or is not usable

      • BlobCacheService

        public BlobCacheService(PermanentBlobCache permanentBlobCache,
                        TransientBlobCache transientBlobCache)
        Instantiates a new BLOB cache.
        参数:
        permanentBlobCache - BLOB cache to use for permanent BLOBs
        transientBlobCache - BLOB cache to use for transient BLOBs
